## Background

This report aims to explore trends in depression & anxiety drug prescriptions with education across Scotland.

This will be done using Public Health Scotland prescribing data from July 2025 ==(might change to 2025-)== and data from Scotland's census 2022.

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(gt)
library(here)

data_july2025 <- read_csv("https://www.opendata.nhs.scot/dataset/84393984-14e9-4b0d-a797-b288db64d088/resource/12448904-f11c-4a0f-8dab-8b47c5abebf8/download/pitc202507.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()

```
